title: Grading and excavation permits
dataVerified: Permit holder, property address, grading scope, erosion control plan
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents unauthorized grading. Domain binding verifies public works/building department. Erosion control compliance. Prevents slope failure liability. Stormwater management.
